trans-unit.source: Encapsulates an identification string that Microsoft Office uses to refer to controls.
trans-unit.target: 封装 Microsoft Office 用于引用控件的标识字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlId> can identify either an Office built-in control (by using the control's `idMSO` identifier) or a custom control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlId> 可以识别的任一 Office 内置控件 (通过使用控件的`idMSO`标识符) 或自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of built-in Office identifiers, see [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).
trans-unit.target: 有关内置 Office 标识符的列表，请参阅[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that describes whether this <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlId.ControlIdType" /> identifies a Microsoft Office control or a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值描述此 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlId.ControlIdType" /> 标识 Microsoft Office 控件还是自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlIdType" /> enumeration value that describes whether this <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlId.ControlIdType" /> identifies an Office control or a custom control.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlIdType" />枚举值，描述是否这<see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControlId.ControlIdType" />标识的 Office 控件或自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 获取自定义控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains an identifier for a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含自定义控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an identifier for a Microsoft Office control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office 控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains an identifier for an Office control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含 Office 控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid Office IDs, see [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效的 Office Id 的列表，请参阅[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。
